membership: EMERSON IS A MAJOR GLOBAL MANUFACTURING COMPANY AND IS THEREFORE A MEMBER OF MULTIPLE ORGANIZATIONS AROUND THE WORLD, SUCH AS ORGALIME, CEMEP AND GAMBICA IN EUROPE.
